CustomField.formula: (CASE( Time_to_resolve__c , "A", 5, "B", 4,"C",3, "D",2,"F",1,0) + CASE( Time_to_respond__c , "A", 5, "B", 4,"C",3, "D",2,"F",1,0) + CASE( Quality_of_on_line_help__c , "A", 5, "B", 4,"C",3, "D",2,"F",1,0)) / (CASE( Time_to_resolve__c , "A", 5, "B", 5,"C",5, "D",5,"F",5,0) + CASE( Time_to_respond__c , "A", 5, "B", 5,"C",5, "D",5,"F",5,0) + CASE( Quality_of_on_line_help__c , "A", 5, "B",5,"C",5, "D",5,"F",5,0))
CustomField.label: Closed case score
